If you've ever searched for "unlimited AI memory tool", you know exactly how this feels.

howToSteps.name: Optimize ChatGPT native settings
howToSteps.text: Enable Memory, write detailed Custom Instructions, and set up Projects in ChatGPT.

howToSteps.name: Install a persistent memory extension
howToSteps.text: Add a memory extension like Tools AI from the Chrome Web Store for automatic context capture.

howToSteps.name: Use AI normally for 2-3 days
howToSteps.text: Have your normal conversations. The solution ranges from simple toggles to full automation and the more thorough solutions take about the same effort to set up.

howToSteps.name: Verify persistent memory is working
howToSteps.text: Start a new chat and reference a previous session. The AI should have full context.

howToSteps.text: Use the extension's search to find any conversation across any AI platform instantly.
